ACQUIRE SERVICES (MODIFIED)     It is the intent of the South Carolina Department of Social Services (SCDSS) to solicit proposals to provide the agency with  a SaaS solution to increase recruitment of foster families to provide suitable care for youth while decreasing the time it takes  to approve licensure of families and ensure that families including kin can complete the process and provide a safe home  for children and youth in foster care. The solution must have both licensing and placement modules.  A complete list of  requirements is provided in Section III of this solicitation.    The five-year not-to-exceed budget for this solution is $5000000. Offers greater than this amount will be rejected  as non-responsive and not considered for award. This amount is the five-year budget for the entire project including  software licensing reporting capabilities for requested reports and all other costs.
